com.example.n8tech.taskcan.Models

Class Task

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.n8tech.taskcan.Models.Task

  • public class Task
extends java.lang.Object
    Task represents a task posted by a requester and stores task details. This class encapsulates fields and methods related to the task object.
    Author:
    CMPUT301W18T06
    See Also:
    BidList

    • Constructor Detail

      • Task

        public Task()
        Empty constructor

      • Task

        public Task(java.lang.String name,
            java.lang.String description,
            java.lang.String ownerUsername,
            java.lang.String ownerId,
            java.lang.String category)
        Creates a Task object with the minimum details as specified by requirements. A new BidList is created, task status is set to "Requested", task completed is set to false and default values are set.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the task with a maximum length of 30 characters
        description - brief description of the task with a maximum length of 300 characters
        ownerUsername - username of the task requester
        ownerId - task requester ID
        category - category the task belongs to

      • getStatus

        public java.lang.String getStatus()
        Returns the task status, one of:
        • Done - task has been completed.
        • Assigned - a task provider has been chosen.
        • Requested - task bid list has no bids.
        • Bidded - task bid list has at least one bid.
        Returns:
        task status of completion
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - If none of these statuses are applicable.

      • addBidder

        public void addBidder(Bid bid)
        Adds a bid to the task bid list only when task status is either "Requested" or "Bidded".
        Parameters:
        bid - bid to be added to task bid list
